leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too:`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly.''

VICK NOT PARTYING: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Michael Vick spent 18 months in prison on federal charges of running a dogfighting ring. His starring performance for Philadelphia this season makes him among the leading contenders for The Associated Press' NFL Comeback

Steve Ballmer also disclosed that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career, Steve Ballmer said in his e-mail.`` He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team.''
